hero.heading: Discover the world's symbolic heritage
hero.subheading: Explore, contribute and learn about cultural patterns through the ages
hero.community: Join a community of cultural enthusiasts

sections.newsletterSub: Receive the latest updates on new symbols and features

quickAccess.title: Quick Access
quickAccess.description: Explore, discover and contribute to our global collection of cultural symbols

exploreSymbols.title: Explore Symbols
exploreSymbols.description: Discover our comprehensive collection with advanced filters

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: Share your discoveries with the community

featured.title: Thematic Collections
featured.description: Explore fascinating journeys through symbols from around the world. Each collection tells a unique story.

callToAction.joinUs: Join our global community of heritage enthusiasts
callToAction.description: Help us preserve and celebrate cultural symbols from around the world through collaborative documentation and sharing.
callToAction.support: Your contributions help preserve the world's symbolic heritage for future generations.

mapping.title: Global Mapping
mapping.description: Visualize symbolic connections between cultures and historical periods through our interactive mapping interface.

identification.title: Symbol Identification
identification.description: Upload images to identify symbols and discover their cultural context, history and meaning.

documentation.title: Collaborative Documentation
documentation.description: Contribute to our database by adding symbols, historical context and cultural significance.
